devdoc.title: Storage * @dev Store & retreive value in a variable

evm.assembly:
/* "test":135:455  contract Storage {... */
  mstore(0x40, 0x80)
  callvalue
  dup1
  iszero
  tag_1
  jumpi
  0x00
  dup1
  revert
tag_1:
  pop
  dataSize(sub_0)
  dup1
  dataOffset(sub_0)
  0x00
  codecopy
  0x00
  return
stop

sub_0: assembly {
        /* "test":135:455  contract Storage {... */
      mstore(0x40, 0x80)
      callvalue
      dup1
      iszero
      tag_1
      jumpi
      0x00
      dup1
      revert
    tag_1:
      pop
      jumpi(tag_2, lt(calldatasize, 0x04))
      shr(0xe0, calldataload(0x00))
      dup1
      0x6057361d
      eq
      tag_3
      jumpi
      dup1
      0xb05784b8
      eq
      tag_4
      jumpi
    tag_2:
      0x00
      dup1
      revert
        /* "test":240:309  function ... */
    tag_3:
      tag_5
      0x04
      dup1
      calldatasize
      sub
      0x20
      dup2
      lt
      iszero
      tag_6
      jumpi
      0x00
      dup1
      revert
    tag_6:
      dup2
      add
      swap1
      dup1
      dup1
      calldataload
      swap1
      0x20
      add
      swap1
      swap3
      swap2
      swap1
      pop
      pop
      pop
      tag_7
      jump	// in
    tag_5:
      stop
        /* "test":369:453  function retreive() public view returns ... */
    tag_4:
      tag_8
      tag_9
      jump	// in
    tag_8:
      mload(0x40)
      dup1
      dup3
      dup2
      mstore
      0x20
      add
      swap2
      pop
      pop
      mload(0x40)
      dup1
      swap2
      sub
      swap1
      return
        /* "test":240:309  function ... */
    tag_7:
        /* "test":299:302  num */
      dup1
        /* "test":290:296  number */
      0x00
        /* "test":290:302  number = num */
      dup2
      swap1
      sstore
      pop
        /* "test":240:309  function ... */
      pop
      jump	// out
        /* "test":369:453  function retreive() public view returns ... */
    tag_9:
        /* "test":415:422  uint256 */
      0x00
        /* "test":440:446  number */
      dup1
      sload
        /* "test":433:446  return number */
      swap1
      pop
        /* "test":369:453  function retreive() public view returns ... */
      swap1
      jump	// out
